long_description: Effective agent for removing the poisonous, oily irritant of poison oak, ivy and sumac before and after the rash has started. Easy to use in the field, without water. Allows natural healing process to begin unimpeded. Can also use to decontaminate clothing, tools and pets. Outdoor industry-proven since 1977.
short_description: Effective agent for removing the poisonous, oily irritant of poison oak, ivy and sumac before and after the rash has started.
